item.title: awards
item.description: Awards September 2018 Stefano Coretta, Massimiliano Canzi (joint winners) Best Student Abstract submitted to the LAGB 2018 (Linguistic Association of Great Britain) ‘The effect of lexical frequency on vowel phonation as a correlate of /t/-glottaling’.
